sections.heading: Western Interstate Nuclear Compact.Section 11-9-2 - Board members.Section 11-9-3 - Regulations.
Board members.
sections.text:
The member of the western interstate nuclear compact board shall be appointed by the governor. The alternate provided under Article 2 A of the compact [11-9-1 NMSA 1978] shall be designated by the member representing this state and shall serve at his pleasure.

History:1953 Comp., § 4-34-2, enacted by Laws 1969, ch. 40, § 2.

sections.heading: Regulations.
sections.text:
Under Article 2 J of the compact [11-9-1 NMSA 1978], the western interstate nuclear board shall file copies of its bylaws and any amendments in accordance with the State Rules Act [Chapter 14, Article 4 NMSA 1978].

History:1953 Comp., § 4-34-3, enacted by Laws 1969, ch. 40, § 3.
